data.text:
@AlmandineGalaxy @Legofootmassage @Nortuet yeah its the reason he barely pays attention to lefou even though  their in a relationship
lefou worships the ground gaston walks on so its no fun showing off in front of him, he needs to constantly prove himself to new people and his ego almost breaks when belle refuses
@Legofootmassage @Nortuet Because he's a predator.  It's not about being with the most beautiful woman, it's about teaching a lesson to the woman who dared to refuse him.
@Nortuet Seriously, I would have gone for the triplets anyway... Gaston's an idiot.
@katventute @ash_worlder @Nortuet Well you can even if ya not a woman * wink wink *
@justanotherfat7 Honestly I think right now theyâ€™re just plotting their revenge.
@Nortuet I heard someone theroise that he's actually chasing after someone who actively avoids him to cope with his inability to come to terms with the fact that he's gay.
@katventute @ash_worlder @Nortuet Lol ya dont have to be a woman to want him to do ya lol
@Nortuet Whats the difference between furries and gaston
@yuyoyiyo @Nortuet @GreninjaGuy97 Kinda hard to have a redemption arc when you fall to your death from a tower

@Nortuet Who isn't into furries tho

Like seriously
